The graphic used by Fox News in their te: s death showed Aretha Franklin in the foreground but Patti LaBelle in the background.
Jessica Santostefano: Vice President -- Media Desk at Fox News, issued an apology for the mistake, stating that their intention was to honor Franklin using a secondary image of her performing with Patti LaBelle, but the image of Franklin was obscured in the process.
